Class.name: EF.contextData
Class.Description:
VC/m status:
ObjectComponentLocationDate/TimeUser
EF.contextData.CLS/EV.3CLS.EF.contextDataSmallDev20-Apr-16 11:19FredG

Method.name: createFromFrontendCSPSession
Method.Implementation:
set contextData = ..%New() set contextData.eventID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xEventID"))
Do contextData.setControllerID()
set contextData.languageID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xPrefLangID")) if contextData.languageID="" { set contextData.languageID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xLangID")) } do contextData.setAuditPersonIDfromFrontend()
set contextData.sessionID=%session.SessionId return contextData

Method.name: setControllerID
createFromBackendCSPSession
Method.Implementation:
set contextData = ..%New() set contextData.eventID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xEventID"))
Do contextData.setControllerID()
set contextData.languageID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xLangID"))
do contextData.setAuditPersonIDfromBackend()
set contextData.sessionID=%session.SessionId return contextData

Method.name: getIPaddress
setAuditPersonIDfromFrontend
setAuditPersonIDfromBackend

Class.name: EF.contextDataRegistration
Class.Description:
VC/m status:
ObjectComponentLocationDate/TimeUser
EF.contextDataRegistration.CLS/EV.4CLS.EF.contextDataRegistrationSmallDev02-Sep-16 14:23JeremyW

Property.name: loggedInPersonID
Property.Description: if website is private, this will be set to the cod.objPerson.ID of that logged in person

Method.name: createFromFrontendCSPSession
Method.Implementation:
#dim sessionID as %String = %session.SessionId
set contextData = ##super()
set contextData.tempPersonID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","currentPersonID")) set contextData.loggedInPersonID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","xtfrontend","MyAccount","personID")) set contextData.backendPersonID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xPersonID")) set contextData.attendeeCategoryID=##class(eCom.tempPurchase).getEventCategory(sessionID,contextData.tempPersonID) if contextData.attendeeCategoryID="" { if contextData.loggedInPersonID { // this will be used to restrict the categories of sessions in the daily agenda before registration set contextData.attendeeCategoryID=##class(links.lnkPersonEventCategory).getPreSelectedAttendeeCategoryID(contextData.eventID,contextData.loggedInPersonID) } else { set contextData.attendeeCategoryID = ##class(setup.lnkCategoryEvent).getDefault(contextData.eventID) } } set contextData.currencyID=+##class(eCom.tempPurchase).getCurrencyID(sessionID) set contextData.isAmendment=+$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","amend")) set contextData.tempPurchaseID=##class(eCom.tempPerson).getTempPurchaseID(contextData.tempPersonID) set contextData.isBackendBooking=##class(eCom.tempPurchase).isBackendBooking(sessionID) set contextData.pricingHorologUTC=##class(eCom.tempPurchase).getPriceHorologUTC(contextData.tempPurchaseID) set contextData.prowebMode=%session.Get("mode") set contextData.pageID=%session.Get("pageID") set contextData.prowebComponentName = "Main List" do contextData.setAuditPersonIDfromFrontend()
set contextData.isBackendSuperUser=##class(eCom.tempPurchase).isBackendSuperUser(sessionID)
return contextData

Method.name: createFromTempPersonID
createMock
Method.Implementation:
#dim mockpersonID as %Integer = 1
set contextData = ..%New()
set contextData.eventID=1 set contextData.languageID=1 set contextData.tempPersonID=mockpersonID set contextData.loggedInPersonID=mockpersonID set contextData.attendeeCategoryID=1 set contextData.currencyID=1 set contextData.isAmendment=0 set contextData.tempPurchaseID=1 set contextData.isBackendBooking=0 set contextData.pricingHorologUTC=##class(shared.timeFunctions).getCurrentHorologUTC() set contextData.prowebMode="preview" set contextData.sessionID="mockSession"
return contextData

Method.name: isMockSession
Method.Implementation: return ..sessionID = "mockSession"

Method.name: getNewFloatingMenuCounter
Method.Implementation: set ..prowebFloatingMenuCounter = ..prowebFloatingMenuCounter+1 return ..prowebFloatingMenuCounter

Class.Description:
VC/m status:
ObjectComponentLocationDate/TimeUser
EF.contextDataRegistration.CLS/EV.4CLS.EF.contextDataRegistrationSmallDev02-Sep-16 14:23JeremyW

Property.name: loggedInPersonID
Property.Description: if website is private, this will be set to the cod.objPerson.ID of that logged in person

Method.name: createNew
Method.Implementation:
#dim mockTempPersonID as %Integer = 100 #dim mockBackendUserD as %Integer = 1 #dim mockEventID as %Integer = 15235 #dim mockPageID as %Integer = 122589
set contextData = ..%New()
set contextData.componentName = "Main List" set contextData.eventID = mockEventID set contextData.pageID = mockPageID set contextData.languageID=1 set contextData.tempPersonID = mockTempPersonID set contextData.loggedInPersonID = mockBackendUserD set contextData.attendeeCategoryID=1 set contextData.currencyID=1 set contextData.isAmendment=0 set contextData.tempPurchaseID=1 set contextData.isBackendBooking=0 set contextData.pricingHorologUTC=##class(shared.timeFunctions).getCurrentHorologUTC() set contextData.prowebMode="preview" set contextData.sessionID="mockSession"
return contextData

Method.name: addOpenInFormModalButton
Method.Description: Creates a button that opens a modal defined by baseUrl and contentClass. When submitted, the page controller will be validated and updated, but it will not run the save method.
Method.Implementation:
set element=##class(EF.pageController.buttons.openInFormModal).addElementToParent($this,identifier,description) do element.setModalContentDefinition(contentClass,baseUrl,.modalRequestData)
return element

Method.name: addTranslateButton
Method.Description: Adds a translation button with warning icon which opens an in-form modal
Method.Implementation: set element=..addOpenInFormModalButton(identifier,description,baseUrl,contentClass,.modalRequestData) set element.uiComponent.title=title do element.uiComponent.addClass("ef-translate-button") set warningIcon=##class(EF.ui.components.backend.warningIcon).%New(identifier_"-warning-icon") do element.uiComponent.addChild(warningIcon) if showWarning { do element.uiComponent.addClass("ef-translate-button-show-warning") } return element

Class.name: EF.pageController.element
Class.Description:
VC/m status:
ObjectComponentLocationDate/TimeUser
EF.pageController.element.CLS/EV.8CLS.EF.pageController.elementSmallDev02-Sep-16 14:23JeremyW

Property.name: identifier
Property.Description: The description of the property. Should be unique for each pageInstance

Property.name: displayOrder
Property.Description: needed to be able to output proweb items in the correct order until we change the 'allPageElements' proper in EF.pageController.page to be a list

Property.name: isModalTempData
Property.Description: Anything marked with isModalTempData set will be cleared down when a modal is re-opened

Method.name: %OnNew
delete
addChild
updateAllPageElements
Method.Implementation: do ..page.allPageElements.SetAt($this,..identifier) set key="" for { set child=..elementChildren.GetNext(.key) if key="" quit do child.updateAllPageElements() }

Method.name: reloadUIComponent
Method.Implementation: do ..initialiseUIComponent(..getDefaultUIComponent())

Method.name: render
Method.Implementation: do ..uiComponent.render()

Method.name: renderStart
Method.Implementation: do ..uiComponent.renderStart()

Method.name: renderEnd
Method.Implementation: do ..uiComponent.renderEnd()

Method.name: initialiseUIComponent
Method.Implementation: set ..uiComponent=uiComponent

Method.name: getDefaultUIComponent
Method.Implementation: set htmlIdentifier="ef_control_"_..identifier quit ##class(EF.ui.components.base).%New(htmlIdentifier)

validateElement

validateValue

Method.name: setErrorMessage
Method.Implementation: do ..errorMessages.Insert(..getDescriptionForError(errorMessage)) set ..page.hasError=1

Method.name: getDescriptionForError
Method.Implementation: return ..getBaseErrorMessage()_errorMessage_"."

Method.name: createContextData
Method.Implementation:
set contextData = ##class(EF.contextData).%New() set contextData.eventID=..getEventID()
Do contextData.setControllerID()
set contextData.languageID=$$$efEnglishLangID set contextData.auditPersonID=..xCRuserID
set contextData.sessionID=..page.sessionID return contextData

Method.name: getRequestData
Method.Implementation: return ..page.requestData.GetAt(name)

Method.Description: Should be run if any of the sub-classes are deleted
Method.Implementation: kill ^EF.pageController.elementD,^EF.pageController.elementI

Method.name: getBaseErrorMessage
Method.Implementation: return "The changes can't be saved because "

loadEventConfiguration

Method.name: open
createRequestData
Method.Implementation: set name="" for { set name=$O(arrayOfRequestData(name)) if name="" quit set value=$G(arrayOfRequestData(name)) do ..requestData.SetAt(value,name) }

Method.name: load
Method.Implementation: do ..loadData() do ..updateUIComponents()

Method.name: save
saveInFormModals
isSystemPage
Method.Implementation: return ..#isSystemPage

Method.name: saveData
Method.Implementation: throw ##class(shared.exceptions.generalException).%New("Not implemented")

Method.name: processDelete
Method.Implementation: set deleteButton=..getElementByIdentifier(deleteButtonIdentifier) set deleteMethod=deleteButton.deleteMethod do $Method($this,deleteMethod,deleteButton)

Method.name: auditChanges
clearDownOld
Method.Description: Clear down all data from more than 2 days old

Method.name: deleteForCurrentSession
Method.Description: Deletes old data with the same sessionID and loadingClass
Method.Implementation: set rs=##class(%ResultSet).%New("%Library.DynamicQuery:SQL") Set tableName=##class(EF.utils.classes).getFullTableRefFromFullClassName(..%ClassName(1)) set query="SELECT ID FROM "_##class(EF.encoders.sql).encodeTableName(tableName)_" WHERE (sessionID = ?)" do rs.Prepare(query) do rs.Execute(..sessionID) while rs.Next() { set pageController=##class(EF.pageController.page).%OpenId(rs.Get("ID")) do pageController.delete() }

Method.name: clearDownModalTempData
Method.Description: Clears down elements with isModalTempData = 1 before loading the page

Method.name: removeModalTempDataFlagForPage
Method.Implementation: &SQL(UPDATE EF_pageController.element SET isModalTempData=0 WHERE page = :pageControllerID AND isModalTempData = 1 )

Method.name: canUpdate
Method.Description: Checks whether we are allowed to update this data set

Method.name: insertAllProwebItems
addControllerForProwebItem
getElementForQuestion
addProwebDropdownElement
Method.Implementation:
#dim prowebID as %Integer = prowebItem.%Id() #dim itemName as %String = ##class(sc.xModules.objCODitem).getCODItemName(prowebID) #dim value as %String = ##class(eCom.tempCodData).get(..contextData.tempPersonID, itemName) #dim elementIdentifier as %String = ..getElementIdentifierForProwebItems(prowebItem) #dim labelText as %String = ##class(sc.objData).getQuestionPrompt(prowebID, ..contextData.languageID)
set dropdown = ..addProwebDropdown(elementIdentifier, labelText, value) set dropdown.displayOrder = prowebItem.displayOrder
set rsAlternative = ##class(cod.objItemAlternatives).getAlternativesForCodItemAsResultSet( prowebItem.objItemName.%Id() ) while rsAlternative.Next() { Set alternativeDescription = rsAlternative.Get("description") set alternativeValue = alternativeDescription // ###### needs to be changed for multilingual alternatives ######## set alternative = dropdown.addAlternative(alternativeValue,alternativeDescription) }
return dropdown

Method.name: getElementIdentifierForProwebItems
Method.Implementation: #dim prowebID as %Integer = prowebItem.%Id() return "proweb-"_prowebID

Method.name: renderProwebItemsForComponent
Method.Description: this method needs rewriting when the arrayOfElements become a list instead of an array

Method.name: debugTarget
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebTextInput(elementIdentifier, "First Name", "Elvis") set element.displayOrder = 1 d page.renderAllProwebItems()

Method.name: TestVeryBasicPage
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebTextInput(elementIdentifier, "First Name", "Elvis") set element.displayOrder = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "FirstName" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestBasicPageWithMandatoryTextField
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebTextInput(elementIdentifier, "First Name", "Elvis") set element.displayOrder = 1 set element.uiComponent.isMandatory = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "FirstName" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestBasicPageWithTextBlock
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebTextBlock(elementIdentifier, "lorem ipsum") set element.displayOrder = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "loremipsum" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestBasicPageWithDivider
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebDivider(elementIdentifier,"") set element.displayOrder = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestPageWithDropdown
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebDropdown(elementIdentifier, "diet", "") set alternative = element.addAlternative("meat","meat") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegetarian","vegetarian") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegan","vegan") set element.displayOrder = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "dietmeatvegetarianvegan" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestPageWithDropdownPreSelected
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebDropdown(elementIdentifier, "diet", "vegan") set alternative = element.addAlternative("meat","meat") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegetarian","vegetarian") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegan","vegan") set element.displayOrder = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "dietmeatvegetarianvegan" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.name: TestPageWithDropdownMandatory
Method.Implementation: set contextData = ##class(EF.contextDataRegistrationMock).createMock() set page=##class(EF.pageController.proweb.page).createNew(contextData) set elementIdentifier = "proweb-1" set element = page.addProwebDropdown(elementIdentifier, "diet", "vegan") set alternative = element.addAlternative("meat","meat") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegetarian","vegetarian") set alternative = element.addAlternative("vegan","vegan") set element.displayOrder = 1 set element.uiComponent.isMandatory = 1 do page.updateUIComponents() set returnedHTML = ##class(EF.utils.outputRedirection).redirectMethodOutputToString(page,"renderAllProwebItems") set returnedHTML = $ZStrip(returnedHTML,"*WC") set expectedHTML = "dietChooseone...meatvegetarianvegan" do $$$AssertEquals(returnedHTML,expectedHTML)

Method.Implementation: do ..OnPagePageTop() do ..OnPagePageContent() do ..OnPagePageBottom()

Method.name: OnPagePageTop
Method.Implementation:
w ##class(shared.pageMethods).outputFrontendHeader() Write !,"<head>" Write ! do ##class(layout.objTemplate).writeBit("","{{ef_header}}") Write ! Do ..Include("frontendHTTPheader.csp") Write ! Do ..Include("colourScheme.csp") do ..OnPagePageHeaderCSS() Write !,!,"</head>" Write !,"<body class=""bodyBackground"">" Write !,!,!,! set app=##class(sc.objData).applicationPath() if ..#hasRegistrationQuestions { set isCOD = 1 } do ##class(cspRealEV.system.proweb.templatestart).OnPageCSPROOT()
do ##class(layout.objTemplate).writeBit("{{ef_header}}","{{ef_banner}}") do ##class(layout.objTemplate).writeBit("{{ef_banner}}","{{ef_main_progress}}") if ..#showRegistrationProgressBar { if ($G(%session.Data("mode"))="preview")!($G(%session.Data("inSitePageEditing"))) { if '%request.Get("hideButtons") { Do ..Include("progress.csp") } } } do ##class(layout.objTemplate).writeBit("{{ef_main_progress}}","{{ef_main_header}}")

Method.name: outputProwebListRows
Method.Description: this is for version 1 of proweb
Method.Implementation: set beforeItem=##class(sc.xModules.objPage).getBeforeItem(pageID) new pageURL,app // Clear previously set component KILL %session.Data("beforeRow") KILL %session.Data("afterRow") KILL %session.Data("beforeItem") KILL %session.Data("afterItem") KILL %session.Data("componentName") // retrieve the passed component name set %session.Data("beforeRow")="" set %session.Data("afterRow")="" if isHTMLTable { set %session.Data("beforeItem")=(beforeItem) set %session.Data("afterItem")="" } else { set %session.Data("beforeItem")="" set %session.Data("afterItem")="" } set %session.Data("componentName")=componentName set isRepeatedList=paramIsRepeatedList set app=##class(sc.objData).applicationPath() set pageURL=app_"/system/proweb/tagFree.csp" do ##class(cspRealEV.system.proweb.tagfree).OnPageCSPROOT()

renderFloatingEditMenu
Method.Description: #### The whole mechanism of outputting the floaters needs refactoring ####
Method.Implementation:
#dim prowebID as %Integer = ..prowebItem.%Id()
set editMenuStr(1) = "" set context = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
set context.menuID = floatingEditMenuID set context.pageName = %request.PageName set context.idx = 1 set context.app = "/"_##class(EF.config.clientData).getCSPAppForCurrentNameSpace() set context.editID = prowebID set context.viewID = prowebID set context.listID = prowebID set context.dataID = prowebID set context.orgDataID = prowebID set context.orgDataID = prowebID set context.deleteID = prowebID set context.isCOD = 1 set context.isDOC = 0 set context.isForm = 1 set context.pageID = ##class(sc.objData).getPageID(prowebID) set context.showPubl = 1 set context.langID = ##class(sc.methods).getLangFromPageID(context.pageID)
set context.suppressDelete = 0 // ###### set context.templateFilename = "null" // ###### set context.componentName = "####" set context.templateID = "null" // ###### set context.displayOrder = "null" // ######
set question = ##class(sc.objData).%OpenId(prowebID) do question.getEditMenuArray(context,.editMenuStr)
set key = "" for { set key = $Order(editMenuStr(key)) if key = "" quit
write !,editMenuStr(key) }

Method.name: render

Export.CSP:
<csp:class encoded="1" private="1">
<script language="cache" method="OnPreHTTPafter" arguments="" returntype="%Library.Boolean"> 
	/// saves the submitted data from the request into the temp structure
	/// this page can be called by all pages using the pageClass structure for temp storage, no configuration required
	
	do ##class(shared.pageMethods).createBackendVariables()
	set contextData = ##class(EF.contextData).createFromBackendCSPSession()
	set pageControllerID=%request.Get("pageControllerID")
	
	set ok=1
	try {
		set pageController=##class(EF.pageController.page).open(pageControllerID,contextData)
	} catch {
		set ok=0
	}
	if 'ok {	
		set %response.Redirect=%request.Get("efFromPage")
		quit 0
	}
	
	/// Default the response to the calling page
	set redirectURL=##class(shared.pageMethods).addParamsToURL(pageController.#returnPage,"pageControllerID="_pageControllerID)
	
	
	set %response.Redirect=redirectURL
	
	set pageController.submitButtonClickedIdentifier=%request.Get("efSubmitButtonIdentifier")
	
	if %request.Get("efSaveAndReloadFormOnly") {
		// copy submitted fields into the temp structure
		do pageController.updateFromRequest()
		do pageController.%Save()
	} elseif $L(%request.Get("efDeleteButtonIdentifier")) {
		do pageController.processDelete(%request.Get("efDeleteButtonIdentifier"))
		set %response.Redirect=pageController.getSuccessURL()
	} else {
		// copy submitted fields into the temp structure
		do pageController.updateFromRequest()
		
		// validate all data
		do pageController.validatePage()
		
		// save the temp structure to database
		if 'pageController.hasError {
			// save temp structure to database
			Try {
				// the save has the validation and THROWS exceptions if any validations fail
				do pageController.save()
				// If successfully saved we should not include pageDataPageDetailsID as this should refresh the page
				set %response.Redirect=pageController.getSuccessURL()
			} Catch exObj {
				set ok=0
				If exObj.%IsA("shared.exceptions.generalException") {
					set error=exObj.DisplayString()
				} else {
					// don't know what this error was (like a sub method throwing an error)
					set error="There was an error saving this page"
					throw exObj
				}
				do pageController.setErrorMessage(error)
				
			}
			
		}
		
		do pageController.%Save()
	}
	quit 0
</script>

#(pageHeading)#
Email #(##class(eCom.tempCodData).get(%request.Get("tempPersonID"),"email"))#
#(pageHeading)#
 
Uploaded Files
#($P(filename,"_",3,99))# #(size\1024)# Kb #(date)#  #(time)# remove
    Add another Goto Experimental CMS version
#[ do ##class(sc.methods).outputFormCompleteMarker() ]#

// please note that the NEW command dannot be used in rules! (nor the: ) // This little beuty replaces the given path in compile time with a call to an inherited page method in runtime! // It also translates the 'Alt' and the 'Title' attributes //Same as above but for input tags with images (submit button to you and me) // language thing for href tags with titles // language thing for span tags with titles // Replace the path to the stylesheet // No longer needed, but you can't just delete a csp rule // Translate the breadtext // create if statements around a section of code based on the systemType (setup.objSystemType) The autoelse=1 causes an ELSE to be written automatically containing the "This is only available in the following editions..." message If autoelse is used then you CANNOT use ELSE. do email stuff see description for systemTypeIF // ============================================================================================================================= // please note that the NEW command cannot be used in rules! (nor the: ) // ============================================================================================================================= The CS:TEXT tag is the proWeb's initialising a template page. // ============================================================================================================================= The CS:TEXT tag is the proWeb's ending a template page. // ============================================================================================================================= The CS:TEXT tag is the proWeb's way of outputting a block of text. It will include an external page that only handles texts. Texts may include html formatting. // ============================================================================================================================= FRRE RULE The SC:FREE tag is the proWeb's way of outputting a list of freely chosed items. It will include an external page that only handles lists. // ============================================================================================================================= The CS:IMAGE tag is the proWeb's way of outputting an image. It will include an external page that only handles images.

The data type that represents a a page level in the hierachy.

ObjectComponentLocationDate/TimeUser
sc.xModules.objPage.CLS/EV.33CLS.sc.xModules.objPageSmallDev02-Sep-16 14:27JeremyW

Property.name: dataType
Property.Description: Used for identifying the class of the object without having to call cache mysterious APIs.

Property.name: description
Property.Description: Only used in the backend when navigation thru the tree.

Property.name: staticPage
Property.Description: The filename for the static version (if applicable) of this page

Property.name: staticURL
Property.Description: The URL for the static version (if applicable) of this page

Property.name: showInMenu
Property.Description: This prop will be used to build up a tree structure for a dynamic menu system which might be in javascript or in HTML.

Property.name: redirect
Property.Description: holds trhe redirect name for direct access. Generates a static file which redirect to this page

Property.name: allowRemoteUpdating
Property.Description: is the page available for auto update (what's new pages)

Property.name: seoPageName
Property.Description: the seo friendly page name (shown in browser address bar) JAW APR2010

Property.name: titleBarText
Property.Description: the browser title bar text for this page (html TITLE) JAW APR2010

Property.name: seoKeywords
Property.Description: SEO keywords output to the page (used by very few crawlers) JAW APR2010

Property.name: seoDescription
Property.Description: SEO description output to the page (used by some crawlers in different ways) JAW APR2010

Property.name: showInXmlSiteMap
Property.Description: should this page appear in the SEO site map? JAW APR2010 (although not going to be used for now maybe never)

Property.name: promptAlign
Property.Description: pjc 2010-04-21 customisable reg page form parameters alignment of the form prompt TD

Property.name: inputAlign
Property.Description: alignment of the form input TD

Property.name: promptWidth
Property.Description: width of the form prompt TD

Property.name: inputWidth
Property.Description: width of the form input TD

Property.name: promptHeight
Property.Description: height of the form prompt TD

Property.name: inputHeight
Property.Description: height of the form input TD

Property.name: units
Property.Description: unit of measurement for the numeric values

Method.name: getStaticURL
Method.Description: return the static URL for this page if it has been compiled and it is a static page template

Method.name: getTemplateFile
Method.Description: returns the template filename
Method.Implementation: set out="" &SQL(SELECT objTemplate->filename INTO :tmp FROM sc_xModules.objPage WHERE ID = :pageID) if +SQLCODE=0 set out=tmp quit out

Method.name: add
getBeforeItem
Method.Description: pjc 2010-06-01 configurable width + alignment for TDs Method to return the before item string to use as a parameter to the SC:FREE tag Includes any alignment, width etc parameters Includes the default CSS class for TDs Accepts three optional parameters - width, colspan, styleClass, noTR (no table row) Note that this only applies to the prompt TDs Input TDs are written out in coditem.csp

Method.name: getExtraBit
Method.Implementation: set langID=##class(sc.methods).getLangFromPageID(pageID) set extraBit="" if langID'=1 set extraBit=" - "_##class(shared.objLanguage).getLanguageDesc(langID) return extraBit

Method.name: getBookerPageID
getAwardSubmitterPageID
Method.Implementation: set pageID=##class(setup.objEventSetting).getParameter("awards","awardClientPageID",eventID) return pageID

Method.name: isBookerPage
isAwardsEntryPage
isAbstractDocumentPage
isAbstractSignUpPage
isRegistrationPage
Method.Implementation: set parentID=##class(sc.objData).getParentID(pageID) set groupName=##class(sc.xModules.objGroup).getDescription(parentID) set result=0 if $ZCVT(groupName,"L")="registration pages" set result=1 return result

Method.name: isPaymentMethodPage
Method.Implementation: set parentID=##class(sc.objData).getParentID(pageID) set groupName=##class(sc.xModules.objGroup).getDescription(parentID) set result=0 if $ZCVT(groupName,"L")="payment method instructions" set result=1 return result

Method.name: isPageForBooker
Method.Implementation: set result=0 if ..isBookerPage(pageID) set result=1 if ..isPaymentMethodPage(pageID) set result=1 return result

Method.name: checkDependenciesRecursively
Method.Description: check through lists on a page to check for any parents of dependent prompts if these have active, non-cancelled data, return true check needed to prevent deletion of pages containing such items start with a passed-in pageID

Method.name: getTemplateName
updateObjLanguage
Method.Implementation: &SQL(UPDATE sc_xModules.objPage SET objlanguage = :langID WHERE ID = :dataID) if +SQLCODE'=0 throw ##class(shared.exceptions.generalException).%New("updating sc.ObjData with objLanguage failed")

Method.name: getDescription
updateDescription
hasAnyQuestionThatAffectsPricing
Method.Implementation: do ..getArrayOfQuestionsThatAffectsPricing(paymentPageID,.questions) return $Data(questions)>0

Method.name: getArrayOfQuestionsThatAffectsPricing
hasAnyQuestionThatAffectsPaymentMethods
Method.Implementation: do ..getArrayOfQuestionsThatAffectsPaymentMethods(paymentPageID,.questions) return $Data(questions)>0

findChildPageID
getParentGroupName
Method.Implementation: #dim parentID as %Integer #dim parentName as %String set parentID=##class(sc.objData).getParentID(pageID) set parentName=##class(sc.xModules.objGroup).getDescription(parentID) return parentName

Method.name: getEquivalentPageIDForLanguageID
getComponentByDesciption
Method.Implementation: set objComponent="" set pageID=..%Id() set templateID=..objTemplate.%Id() &SQL(SELECT ID INTO :componentID FROM sc.objComponent WHERE (%UPPER(description) = %UPPER(:componentName)) AND (objTemplate = :templateID) AND (objData->parent = :pageID) AND (objData->active=1) ) if +SQLCODE=0 { set objComponent=##class(sc.objComponent).%OpenId(componentID) } return objComponent

Method.name: getGenericDescription
Method.Description: Gets the description without the language modifier

Method.name: isSearchAsYouTypeAllowed
getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase
Method.Implementation: return $Piece( $ZCVT(..objTemplate.filename,"L") ,"/",*)

Method.name: allowRegistrationQuestions
alllowPromptCollections
Method.Implementation: return $Case(..getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase(), "tawardsclient.csp":1, "tbooker.csp":1, "tregistration.csp":1, :0)

Method.name: allowABIs
Method.Implementation: return $Case(..getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase(), "tawardsclient.csp":1, "tbooker.csp":1, "tpaymentmethod.csp":1, "tregistration.csp":1, :0)

Method.name: isSurvey
Method.Implementation: return $Case(..getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase(), "xttsurveypage.csp":1, :0)

Method.name: isHotel
Method.Implementation: return $Case(..getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase(), "tHotelBooking.csp":1, :0)

Method.name: allowDivider
Method.Implementation: return ..allowRegistrationQuestions(componentName)

Method.name: allowMiscMedia
Method.Implementation: return '..isSurvey()

Method.name: allowFrontendUpload
Method.Implementation: return $Case(..getFileNameWithoutPathLowerCase(), "tbooker.csp":1, "tregistration.csp":1, :0)

Query.name: qQuestionsByPageID
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT * FROM sc_xModules.objCODitem WHERE (active=1) AND (parent->parent = :pageID) ORDER BY displayorder

Method.name: getFullPathVCard
Method.Implementation: set overridingSSLmode="" // we might want to change parameterthis in the future if IE decides to give us grief with session cookie again quit ..getFullPath(eventID,overridingSSLmode)

Method.name: getFullPath
Method.Description: use this method to get the domain and cspapp name along with http or https returns something like this: https://www.eventsforce.net/support2

Method.name: removeOpenedImage
Method.Description: removes the image that updates eventsforce to tell us that the email has been opened. we are doing this because this is not the real mail openeing, it is just a preview or a mainatence thing pass in mailDate in $H format

Method.name: cleanIntRedirect
Method.Description: clean the passed in URL to make sure only allow an internal redirection

Method.name: getPageID
Method.Description: method to be used to get pageID to make sure it's "clean"

Method.name: isPageIDValidForEvent

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // retrieve parameters without caring about upper/lower case

Method.name: getParamCaseInsensitive
Method.Implementation:
set out="" set m="" for { set m=$O(%request.Data(m)) if m="" quit set array($ZCVT(m,"L"))=%request.Get(m) } set out=$G(array($ZCVT(parameter,"L")))
if (parameter="pageID")!(parameter="eventID") set out=+out // have to make sure this is numeric otherwise vulnerable to cross site scripting attacks by changing the value in URL quit out

Method.name: recoverEventID
requestGetEventID
Method.Description: this method replaces intersystems %request.Get-method because that one doesn't handle duplicate parameters

Method.name: getSurveyID
Method.Description: Is the page we're in a survey page

Method.name: switchEvent
Method.Description: newEventID can be blank

Method.name: addToLastEventSelected
addToMRU
clearDownBackendSession
Method.Description: clears the backend session from all session variables when logging out
Method.Implementation: kill %session.Data("eventsforce","backend") kill %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend") kill %session.Data("password validated") do ##class(shared.pageMethods).clearBackendMenuCache()

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // this can be called while still being logged in to the backend.

Method.name: clearDownBackendVariables
Method.Description: this is clearing all "backend" except the items listed here
Method.Implementation:
set keep("NAMESPACE")=1 set keep("xClientDir")=1 set keep("xClientStyleDir")=1 set keep("xPersonID")=1 set keep("xUserID")=1
set keep("xLangID")=1 set keep("xLanguage")=1 set keep("xWorkLangID")=1 // need this for page switching to remember current language
set keep("xDateFormat")=1 set keep("xTimeFormat")=1
set keep("xEventID")=1
set keep("orgunit event caching")=1
// Settings that only affect your current session set keep("proweb emergency repair mode")=1 set keep("override test colours")=1 set keep("showLegacyMode")=1
set keep("GlobalSystemSettings")=1
set var="" for { set var=$O(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend",var)) if var="" quit
if '$D(keep(var)) kill %session.Data("eventsforce","backend",var) }

Method.name: setupBackendEventVariables
Method.Implementation: set %session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xEventID")=xEventID set %session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xWorkLangID")=##class(setup.objEventSetting).getParameter("backend","default creation language",xEventID) if '$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xWorkLangID")) set %session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xWorkLangID")=1

Method.name: createBackendVariables
getWorkLangID
getBackendEventIDFromSession
Method.Implementation: return $G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xEventID"))

Method.name: clearBackendMenuCache
Method.Implementation: kill ^CacheTempUserMenu(%session.SessionId)

Method.name: tempPurchaseHasValidBooker
Method.Description: This method checks if the Booker's Identification property is set correctly. This method will be used to nullify booking if the event is using 'email' or 'username' as the identification and somehow those values disappear from the current session just before the booking is saved in the database.

Method.name: isEditMode
Method.Description: This method checks if the 'Edit' or 'Preview' flags are set for a proweb page. If so, it returns 1. Browser dependent %request and %session objects are used here. So, it cannot be used anywhere other than CSP pages.
Method.Implementation: set editMode = 0 if %request.Get("hideButtons") set editMode=1 if %session.Get("mode")="edit",'$G(%session.Data("inSitePageEditing")) set editMode=1 quit editMode

Method.name: getEditMode
Method.Description: This returns the mode of the page E.g. Edit, Preview Checks the request and the session so that it can be used in the page before the mode is set in the session Browser dependent %request and %session objects are used here. So, it cannot be used anywhere other than CSP pages.

Method.name: addRequestDataForCurrentPageToURL
requestDataToParams
Method.Description: go through %request.Data and create a string to add to URLs Deprecated as does not encode parameters - use addRequestDataForCurrentPageToURL instead

Method.name: isRequestSecure
Method.Description: method for determining if the incoming request is secure or not

Method.name: addParamsToURL
Method.Description: Pass in a valid inURL and it will append a parameter string to it *** Deprecated as it does not encode the parameter, should instead use ##class(EF.htmlGenerator).addParameterToURL(inURL, name, value) ***

Method.name: buildFrontendSessionVariablesFromEventID
Method.Implementation: set %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xEventID")=xEventID set %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xClientDir")=##class(setup.objSetting).getParameter("paths","clientDirectory") set language=##class(setup.objEventSetting).getParameter("system","language",xEventID) // v1.1.5 set %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xLanguage")=language set %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xLangID")=##class(shared.objLanguage).getLanguageID(language) set xLangID=%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xLangID") set %session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xDateFormat")=##class(setup.objEvent).getDateFormat(xEventID)

Method.name: getDisplayDescription
Method.Description: get displayable descriptions for certain words

Method.name: doesBackendPageRequireEventID
Method.Implementation:
if (pagename["login") return 0 if (pagename["tc.csp") return 0 if (pagename["tc2.csp") return 0 if (pagename["eventselection") return 0 if (pagename["pagecontrollergrid") return 0 if (pagename["eventcalendarmonthly.csp") return 0 if (pagename["eventproperties") return 0 if (pagename["eventcopy") return 0 if (pagename["logout.csp") return 0 if (pagename["mydetails.csp") return 0 if (pagename["changepassword.csp") return 0 if (pagename["changepasswordmodal.csp") return 0 if (pagename["pagecontrollerstandardsave.csp") return 0 if (pagename["pagecontrollerajaxsave.csp") return 0 if (pagename["addusermetrics.csp") return 0 if (pagename["passwordreset") return 0 if (pagename["backendmenuredirect.csp") return 0 if (pagename["serverstoragesetjson.csp") return 0
return 1

Method.name: isPageEventRelated
Method.Implementation: set pagename=$ZCVT(pagename,"L") if pagename="sessiondump.csp" return 0 if pagename="sysgettotallogins.csp" return 0 if pagename="homepage.csp" return 0 if pagename="initsession.csp" return 0 if pagename="fhome.csp" return 0 return 1

Method.name: endSession
Method.Description:
Ends current session and clears down cookies
Should still have %session available in page
Must be called from preHTTP
Method.Implementation: Set %session.EndSession=1 Set Expires=+$H-1 Set Expires=$ZD(Expires,11) _ ", " _ $ZD(Expires,2) _ " 00:00:00 GMT" do %response.SetCookie("CSPSESSIONID-SP-8443-UP-","",Expires,"/",,1,1)

Method.name: isApplicationStopped
isIncludePage
updateLoadMonitor
manageSEOrequest
injectP3Ppolicy
sanitiseRequestData
isCrossSiteScripting
hasStringBeenSanitisedForCrossSiteScripting
Method.Implementation:
set out=0 if inString["<" set out=1 if inString[">" set out=1 if inString[""" set out=1
quit out

Method.name: getURLforMaintenancePage
Method.Implementation: return "/"_cspAppName_"/system/maintenancePage.htm"

Method.name: getRedirectURLforXSS
Method.Implementation: return "/"_cspAppName_"/frontend/static/invalidURL.htm?reason=csa"

isNewFrontendSession
getRedirectURLforNewSession
hasSwitchedLanguage

isBackendPageAuthorised
isPageIDAllowedForBackendSession

updateDebugInfo
setHTTPHeaderForJSON
Method.Implementation: Set %response.ContentType="application/json" Set %response.CharSet="utf-8" //Required by cache, even though to the json standard specifies that CharSet should not be output in the header.

Method.name: getBackendWorkLangID
Method.Description: sets up the session variables based on the xWorkLangID. If that is not found, we fall back to xLangID which is the passed in default language.
Method.Implementation: set xWorkLangID=%request.Get("xWorkLangID") if xWorkLangID="" set xWorkLangID=$G(%session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xWorkLangID")) if xWorkLangID="" set xWorkLangID=xLangID set %session.Data("eventsforce","backend","xWorkLangID")=xWorkLangID quit xWorkLangID

Method.name: getPageLanguageID
getURLForRedirectedApp
Method.Implementation: set eventID=..requestGetEventID() set path=$P(url,"/",3,$l(url,"/")) set extraParams=##class(shared.pageMethods).requestDataToParams("CSPToken,CSPCHD") set url=..getFullPath(eventID)_"/"_path if $l(extraParams) { set url=url_"?"_extraParams } return url

Method.name: setPageIDIntoSession
Method.Implementation: set %session.Data("pageID")=pageID

Method.name: doesPageHaveAProwebPageID
getFrontendLanguageID
Method.Implementation: return $G(%session.Data("eventsforce","frontend","xPrefLangID"))

Method.name: getPathWithoutApplicationFromURL
Method.Description: E.g https://dev.efsys.net/largedevsrc/backend/dashboard/dashboard.csp returns backend/dashboard/dashboard.csp
Method.Implementation: return $p(url,"/",3,99)

Method.name: getBackendKendoBaseURL
